abstract: Against the Seahawks, the Giants had considerable trouble on the ground.
snippet: Against the Seahawks, the Giants had considerable trouble on the ground.
lead_paragraph: There are plenty of reasons for Giants fans to be up in arms Monday, even if they aren't among the thousands (millions?) of disappointed knockout pool participants who had the Giants winning easily over the Seattle Seahawks.

headline.main: Is There a Solution to Giants' Running Woes?
